name: Legacy Analytics Setup.txt - This is the analytics setup in <https://github.com/razorpay/razorpay.com>
description: This section provides a visual representation of the analytics setup used on the Razorpay.com website, which is hosted on GitHub. This setup likely involves various analytics tools and services integrated into their website to gather insights and metrics for improving user experience and business operations.
capabilities: Integration with analytics tools and services

name: Legacy Analytics Setup.txt - The setup in the new infra <https://github.com/razorpay/frontend-website> is different from this. Checkout <https://alpha.razorpay.com/repo/new-analytics-setup> for new setup
description: This section explains that the setup process for the legacy analytics system is different from the new infrastructure setup. It provides a link to the GitHub repository for the new frontend website, and another link to an internal Razorpay resource that contains information about the new analytics setup. This section implies that the documentation is for the legacy system, and users should refer to the provided resources for information on the new setup.
use_cases: Migrating from the legacy analytics setup to the new infrastructure
Setting up the new analytics system in the new infrastructure
